ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 522
ygData.msgSnippet: The dragon in DL is nasty. My group and I were minding our own business and she walked up and wiped us out in 3 seconds. I didn t even see her. I just saw the
ygData.messageBody:
The dragon in DL is nasty. My group and I were minding our own business and
she walked up and wiped us out in 3 seconds. I didn't even see her. I just
saw the text saying she was attacking and then saw LOADING PLEASE WAIT....
luv,
-Su


That is something I have wondered about myself, a good place to hunt in the
40's. I am in the Dreadlands at 42 and I like it alright because there are
people there going on dragon raids and one of my goals is to go on a dragon
raid someday.
----- Original Message -----
From: Robert Maloney
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, July 10, 2002 4:02 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 522


Hail all and well met. I have been playing EQ since
about Nov of last year and have become adicted to it
just like everyone else. I have also been a member of
this group for awhile but never posted. Have enjoyed
alot of the info that has been put out there. So I
figured it was time for me to come out of the shadows
and let my voice be heard. I been play on Brell,
haven't tried any other servers as of yet. Have alot
of friend on Brell in RL so tis why I stayed on there
for this long. However I do have alittle bit of a
question that I want to put out there. I play a 36
Drunken Chanter of Greenhall, am alittle tired of the
Kunark area and looking for some new places to hunt.
EIther in groups or solo makes me no matter. But I
would like to find a place that i can do both. And
yes this chanter still solos alot. Although my guild
leader doesn't like it, and she has even taken away my
staff so that I couldn't be a chanter tank anymore.
hehe What she doesn't know won't hurt me. hehe
Anyway, did alot of time in LOIO and FM and OT
already. To break it up I even went to SK and soloed
the gnolls at the spires. But now that I am 36 SK
just won't do it much for now. I do have a score to
settle with some giants in the Karanas though. SO I
will be back. But if anyone could shed alittle light
on some good places to group or solo til into the 40s,
with good xp. Not saying I want to lvl every night in
one setting, those places would tend to be full of
death also. Just looking for some nice and calm pace,
but have alittle on the edge feel to it. I get enough
of that on raids. And yes I do go on bigger guild
raids then my lvl should let me, but then again I have
the safety of my guild and some of our allies there.
So if anyone is on Brell and wants to give me a shout
out feel free.


Zindi
36 Drunken Chanter
Elder board for Guardians of Greenhall
